sourcesuses.value: Used as dye for cellulosic fibers, leather, and paper; [HSDB]

comments.value: Oral LD50 (mouse) = 11,450 mg/kg; [RTECS] A thiosulfone dye; May cause mild irritation; Repeated or prolonged exposure may cause respiratory sensitization; [MSDSonline]

processes.value: Industrial Processes with risk of exposure: Leather Tanning and Processing Pulp and Paper Processing Textiles (Printing, Dyeing, or Finishing)
